!! Radhe Radhe ~~ !!

This extension simplifies cheque creation and account management on the SBI website by automating repetitive tasks.


Features:

Bulk Cheque Creation: Effortlessly generate multiple cheques. Simply input the number of accounts and their respective amounts, and the extension will fill in the details for you, using SBI's "moredebit" option.

Account Addition: Add multiple accounts automatically by pasting details in the format "Name | Account Number | IFSC Code". The extension will guide you through the process and complete the actions for each account.


How to Use:

Bulk Cheque: Input the number of accounts and amounts in the respective rows. Click 'Proceed,' and the extension will automate cheque creation for each account.
Account Addition: Paste the required information in the specified format, and the extension will automatically fill and submit the details on SBI's website.
Designed specifically for SBI's website, this tool saves time and reduces manual input, making your banking experience faster and more efficient.
